translation.en: All right, hold on. Let's scoop that midrange.
Stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop.
I was just-- You said play something fast.
[tuts] Did you read the music that I wrote for you?
Do you know what polyrhythms are?
These aren't my drums. They belong to Hunter.
translation.ko: "스컬퍼커" 이건 내 드럼이 아니다, 헌터 거다

translation.en: And he came up with the band name. I don't play the drums, I play the drum.
translation.ko: 밴드 이름도 헌터가 지었다 난 드럼이 아니라 북을 친다

translation.en: This drum, in marching band for two years.
I do it to get out of PE, but Hunter says that doesn't matter.
translation.ko: 체육 수업 빠지려고 하는 건데 헌터는 그래도 상관없단다

translation.en: All it takes to be great is commitment and sacrifice,
translation.ko: 헌신과 희생만 하면 위대해질 수 있다며

translation.en: which is what metal's all about.
or sticking it to the man, or denim, or motorcycles, or speed,
translation.ko: 또는 힘이나 저항 정신 데님, 오토바이, 스피드

translation.en: I don't totally understand it, but Hunter says I don't have to.
translation.ko: 별로 이해는 안 되지만 헌터는 몰라도 된다고 한다

translation.en: All I have to do is--
-[Kevin] Mm. -A bass player will be huge for us.
Emily, can I talk to you for a second?
[sighs] The song you're playing is not the song they are playing.
translation.ko: 넌 애들이랑 아예 다른 곡을 연주하고 있어

translation.en: I'm not sure you're even playing a march.
We've talked about this. You have to listen and play.
It's an orchestra, right? I know we're in a marching band, but--
Fuck! I don't give a fuck about what I'm playing!
I don't give a fuck about what they're playing!
-Too bad she can't play like she throws. -I don't give a fuck, so fuck you!
translation.ko: - 연주보다 던지기를 잘하네 - 관심 없으니까 꺼져요!

translation.en: You can't say that in America.
[Kevin] That seems pretty metal to me, but I'm not sure.
-[school bell ringing] -I'll ask Hunter about it.
He's been into many things since I met him,
but he's stuck with metal longer than any of them.
When his mom left in seventh grade, he decided it was the key to everything.
translation.ko: 7학년 때 엄마가 떠난 후 헌터에게는 메탈이 전부였다

translation.en: If we devote ourselves to metal, we'll own this school.
translation.ko: 메탈에 전념한다면 이 학교는 우리가 접수할 거다

translation.en: [Kevin] Everybody will see what we really are and worship us like gods.
translation.ko: 모두 우리의 본모습을 알고 신처럼 찬양할 것이다

translation.en: I'm willing to give it a try.
ever since he stopped Molly Levine from pulling out my hair in third grade.
translation.ko: 3학년 때 내 머리를 잡아당기던 몰리 러빈을 막아줬을 때부터

translation.en: He always looks out for me.

translation.ko: 돼지 거시기나 빠는 스킵 호프먼 자식

translation.en: I don't think he was trying to hit me. I was just in the way.
translation.ko: 날 치려던 게 아니라 내가 길을 막은 거야

translation.en: -[Skip] Clay Moss. -[Clay] You ready for the game?
What I'm ready for is your homecoming after-party, man.
translation.ko: 네 귀환 기념 뒤풀이에서 놀 준비는 됐지

translation.en: Yep, my parents are in Geneva.
So bring the whole school if you want, man, seriously.
translation.ko: 그러니까 원하면 학교 애들 다 데려와

translation.en: Asked your mom about the double bass kit?
She said she doesn't have a thousand dollars.
Okay, well, what about a double bass pedal?
Won't get the resonance, but we'll have that attack.
Yeah, she said she doesn't have $150 either.
[Hunter] She's in my speech class. I think she's English.
translation.ko: 말하기 수업 같이 듣는 애야 영국인 같아

translation.en: I heard she went apeshit on the band teacher.
[Kevin] I've never been to a party.
I always wondered what people like this did at them.
translation.ko: 이런 애들은 파티에서 뭘 하는지 늘 궁금했다

translation.en: People whose bands didn't have names like Skullfucker.
translation.ko: 밴드 이름을 '스컬퍼커'로 안 짓는 애들 말이다 "몰리코들"

translation.en: in the middle of it all.
This is like three chords and they still can't get it right. They suck.
translation.ko: 코드 세 개 갖고도 헤매고 더럽게 못하는데

translation.en: Look at the drummer. -He's high out of his mind. -[plays offbeat]
translation.ko: 드러머 좀 봐, 약 하고 해롱거려

translation.en: I mean, them, all of them. How did they just… do this,
translation.ko: 아니, 애들 말이야 어떻게 이렇게 놀지?

translation.en: like it's the easiest thing ever?
Okay, listen to me. Things are gonna happen for us.
translation.ko: 야, 잘 들어 우린 잘될 거야

translation.en: Someday, all these people are gonna be like,
"Holy shit! Kevin Schlieb and Hunter Sylvester?"
"I went to high school with those guys."
"I could've even hung out with them, maybe."
But it's gonna be too late,
'cause we're gonna be too busy hanging out with the guys from Iron Maiden.
translation.ko: 우린 아이언 메이든 멤버들이랑 어울리느라 바쁠 테니까

translation.en: Hunter, it's not that bad, actually, once you get used to it. Seriously.
Hunter, seriously, our band is gonna be so awesome.
translation.ko: 헌터, 우리 밴드는 진짜 대박 날 거야

translation.en: I'm gonna practice like five hours a day. I'm gonna be better than Ringo Starr.
translation.ko: 내가 하루에 5시간 연습해서 링고 스타보다 더 잘할게

translation.en: -I'll drive you home when you're finished. -After. After pee-pee.
translation.ko: - 끝나면 집에 태워다 줄게 - 오줌 싸고 나서

translation.en: Because you're pretty. Why else do people stare at you?
Why don't they? I could give you a million reasons. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 왜 안 본대? - 이유야 엄청 많지

translation.en: [Kevin] I am talking to a girl. I'm not even afraid of her.
translation.ko: 내가 여자랑 말을 하다니 얘가 무섭지도 않다

translation.en: [Kevin] This party was a great idea. I don't care what Hunter says.
translation.ko: 파티에 오길 참 잘했다 헌터가 뭐라든 상관없다

translation.en: -And my nose… -Even he must be having fun right now.
Hey, he just called you a dipshit.
-No. No, I-- -What did you call me?
I didn't say anything to anybody. I swear. Yes, you did.
translation.ko: - 진짜 아무 말도 안 했어 - 했잖아

translation.en: [girl] That's why they don't stare at me.
translation.ko: 그래서 사람들이 날 안 보는 거야

translation.en: Her? I could've stared at her.
translation.ko: 쟤? 나도 쟤를 봤을 수도 있겠지

translation.en: I-- I don't-- I don't know either of you. I'm an impartmentege.
translation.ko: 난 너희 둘 다 모르니까 내가 공명한 사람이거든

translation.en: Are you good, bruh? You hurt?
-Here, let me help you. -No, no. Let me help you.
I'm sorry that you feel that way. Do you play?
Me and my friend over here. A real band.
translation.ko: 나랑 여기 내 친구랑 진짜 밴드를 하지

translation.en: Got it. Um, I guess we'll be seeing you at the Battle of the Bands then.
translation.ko: 알았어, 그럼 배틀 오브 밴드 대회에서 보자

translation.en: There hasn't been a Battle of the Bands since Dave Migdall hung brain on stage.
translation.ko: 그 대회는 데이브 믹들이 무대에서 거시기 내놓은 이후로 한 적 없어

translation.en: Go sign up with Dean Swanson, but maybe don't say "fucktard,"
translation.ko: 스완슨 처장님한테 신청해 저능아란 말은 하지 말고

translation.en: All right, guys. Let's keep this party going! Give me your car keys.
translation.ko: - 얘들아, 계속 놀자! - 네 차 키 줘

translation.en: If you'd like to wait until I am done with the Merinos--
I demand you let us compete in the Battle of the Bands.
translation.ko: 저희 배틀 오브 밴드에 나가게 해주세요

translation.en: Not letting us play just because we're a post-death metal band
translation.ko: 저희가 포스트 데스메탈을 한다고 못 나가게 하시면

translation.en: would be a complete violation of our First Amendment rights.
Your First Amendment rights as a minor are unclear,
translation.ko: 미성년자도 수정 헌법 1조 적용 대상인지 애매하지만

translation.en: but I agree it would be wrong to exclude you.
[scoffs] So why didn't anybody tell us about it?
translation.ko: 그런데 왜 아무도 그 얘기를 안 해줬죠?

translation.en: -I wasn't aware you had a death metal-- -[Frank] Post-death.
as long as your performance is appropriate.
I had to work on her, but we're in.
So I guess we should start looking for a bass player, huh?
Battle of the Bands is where it starts for people. Check it out.
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드는 성공의 시작점이거든, 봐

translation.en: Guitarist and singer of Kiloton, Battle of the Bands winners 1996.
translation.ko: 킬로톤의 기타리스트랑 보컬이 1996년 배틀 오브 밴드 우승자야

translation.en: No one in this school liked heavy music same as now,
translation.ko: 이 학교 사람들은 헤비메탈을 안 좋아했는데

translation.en: but Kiloton terrorized their way straight to victory.
they were considered the greatest unsigned metal band in the country.
translation.ko: 미국 최고의 독립 메탈 밴드가 됐고

translation.en: They could have been right up there with Metallica or Pantera,
But you and me, that's not gonna happen to us.
translation.ko: 근데 너랑 난 그럴 일 없을 거야

translation.en: This is our moment. Heavy music is gonna rise up.
translation.ko: 우리의 때가 왔어 헤비메탈이 뜰 거야

translation.en: We win the Battle of the Bands, parlay that win into gigs,
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드에서 우승하고 그 흐름 이어서 공연하는 거야

translation.en: and then those gigs score us a deal.
Cocks. Okay. I've gotta get all the way to C Hall.
But, um, meet me after school. We've got work to do.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 학교 끝나고 보자 할 일이 있어

translation.en: ♪ You'll take my life But I'll take yours too… ♪
[Kevin] It doesn't seem metal to ask if he's got his dad's permission,
translation.ko: 아빠 허락을 받았는지 묻는 건 메탈 정신에 위배되니까

translation.en: This definitely seems metal, right? I mean, I think it does.
translation.ko: 메탈 그 자체다 정말 그런 것 같다

translation.en: I'm not sure my mom and dad will.
[Hunter] These drums are gonna be huge for us.
translation.ko: 이 드럼이 큰 도움 될 거야

translation.en: If you drop your brother off first.
Your father will pick him up between shifts.
translation.ko: 아빠가 교대 근무 사이에 도로 데려올 거야

translation.en: I'm the best at crawl, and I can tread water the second longest.
translation.ko: 내가 크롤 영법을 제일 잘하고 물속에 서 있기도 두 번째로 잘해

translation.en: And I can do the best cannonball, everybody says.
translation.ko: 캐넌볼 다이빙도 내가 제일 잘한대 사람들이 다 그래

translation.en: I thought you were a clarinet player.
That was just so I could do marching band instead of PE.
translation.ko: 체육 수업 빠지려고 고적대 들어가느라 한 거지

translation.en: I saw you on the field.
I hadn't taken my meds for, like… [inhales] …a week.
Do you like… heavy metal at all?
I don't know what that is.
And the Slippers of Spider Climbing go to Malmsteen of Gorgoroth.
translation.ko: 스파이더 클라이밍 슬리퍼가 고르고로스 맘스틴으로 간다

translation.en: What kind of girlie name is Malmsteen of Gorgoroth?
translation.ko: 무슨 여자 이름처럼 고르고로스 맘스틴이 뭐냐?

translation.en: I don't know, Dad. Why don't you ask one of your real housewives
while you're shoving water balloons into their tits?
translation.ko: 그 여자들 가슴에 물풍선 넣어줄 때요

translation.en: [Kevin] I understand Dungeons & Dragons even less than metal,
but it's a chance for us to hang out with new people,
especially ones who play the bass.
[Kevin] If he joins Skullfucker, then we're a band, right?
translation.ko: 얘가 스컬퍼커에 들어오면 우리도 정식 밴드가 되겠지?

translation.en: -So we can play Battle of the Bands. -[clacks]
translation.ko: 그럼 배틀 오브 밴드에 나갈 수 있다

translation.en: If people like us, maybe they'll ask us to play some parties.
translation.ko: 우리가 사람들 마음에 들면 파티에도 초대받을 거다

translation.en: I hope Hunter likes this guy.
Sometimes he's not so nice to people when he's uncomfortable.
Being around his dad makes him--
that a halfling rogue would be dumb and ungrateful enough
to try and rip off a half-orc barbarian
who just saved him from five ice toads.
translation.ko: 얼음 두꺼비 5마리한테서 방금 자길 구해줬는데 말이지

translation.en: But he thinks he'll show mercy.
Until he remembers that mercy is for the weak.
translation.ko: 그런데 자비는 약한 자를 위한 거잖아

translation.en: Malmsteen pulls out Hell Slinger, his +3 great sword…
translation.ko: 맘스틴은 공격치 증가 3짜리 검 헬 슬링어를 뽑아들고…

translation.en: …and he tells Auriac Stormhollow to shut his glory hole
before he starts his first attack.
-Plus ten, that's a hit. -Hunter, don't be an idiot.
translation.ko: - 더하기 10, 잘 나왔다 - 헌터, 이상한 소리 마

translation.en: [Hunter] He runs the blade between the thief's ribs.
translation.ko: 맘스틴이 도둑들의 갈비뼈에 칼날을 쑤셔 넣어

translation.en: Head over to Dr. Sylvester's for some post-op implants,
translation.ko: 실베스터 박사의 보형물 삽입 환자들한테 실시!

translation.en: because I just chopped off your dick.
You just remember that those implants are what paid for your guitar,
translation.ko: 그 보형물 덕분에 네 기타도 사주고

translation.en: and all your dumbass Satan-worship T-shirts!
translation.ko: 사탄 찬양하는 못난 티셔츠도 사주는 건 알아둬!

translation.en: Did you see my American Express?
This sucks compared to Call of Duty. Kevin, see you in class.
translation.ko: '콜 오브 듀티'보다 구려 케빈, 수업 때 보자

translation.en: Hunter, we were going to ask him to play bass for us.
translation.ko: 헌터, 쟤한테 베이스 해달라고 부탁하기로 했잖아

translation.en: It's for the best. We can never trust a guy like that.
translation.ko: 이게 최선이야 저런 애는 믿으면 안 돼

translation.en: [Kevin] I'm telling you, she's really good.
[Hunter] We need a bass player. A metal bass player.
translation.ko: 우린 베이스가 필요해 메탈 베이스 연주자

translation.en: [Hunter] That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard.
translation.ko: 살면서 들어본 말 중 제일 엉뚱한 소리다

translation.en: Why? Why is that the most ridiculous thing you've ever heard?
Because a cello-playing girl is so non-metal
translation.ko: 첼로 하는 여자애는 메탈이랑 거리가 멀어서

translation.en: that even thinking about it is evaporating my balls.
A lot of the time, Hunter, I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.ko: 네가 하는 말은 도통 뭔 소린지 모르겠어

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not right for Skullfucker.
translation.ko: 난 아무래도 스컬퍼커랑 안 맞나 봐

translation.en: Slide over. Open the door, but don't get out.
translation.ko: 이쪽으로 넘어와 문만 열고 나오지는 마

translation.en: -[boy] Did you get her number? -[Skip] Of course I got it.
[Skip] I know I said I'd get her number, but I got her Snapchat.
translation.ko: 번호 따려고 했는데 스냅챗 아이디 받았어

translation.en: -Snapchat is actually… -No! No, no, no, no.
-It's the same thing. -It's not the same thing. You know it.
Why? Why did you do that?
Drive. If he gets close enough, you're just as fucked as I am.
translation.ko: 밟아, 가까이 오면 너도 나랑 골로 가는 거야

translation.en: You slow down, you die. That's metal.
That is a dumb Keanu Reeves movie!
Watch out. He'll see you in the mirrors if he gets close enough.
translation.ko: 조심해, 가까워지면 걔가 널 알아볼 거야

translation.en: [Kevin whimpers] What am I doing? Oh, God!
Okay. We can shake him. -Turn left on Aspen. -[whimpers]
translation.ko: 좋아, 따돌릴 수 있어 애스펀에서 좌회전해

translation.en: -Don't slow down. Keep going straight. -To where? Where?
-There! -[Kevin] I… We will not fit in there!
and speaking truth to power, and sticking it to the man, and speed.
translation.ko: 권력자를 향한 진실 저항 정신, 스피드다

translation.en: Do lines of it in the bathroom.
It's the solo to "Machinery." It fucking shreds.
-[electric guitar riff plays] -I had these made up.
I'll get to work on this, then.
Maybe Hunter'll change his mind about her when I tell him how much she shreds.
translation.ko: 에밀리가 얼마나 잘하는지 말하면 헌터가 마음을 바꿀지도 모른다

translation.en: These are two of the most important tools in your communications toolbox.
translation.ko: 그 두 가지가 의사소통에서 가장 중요한 요소야

translation.en: Enunciation is the way we shape the sounds that come out of our mouths.
translation.ko: 발음은 입에서 나오는 소리의 형태를 잡는 방식이지

translation.en: Dean Swanson wants to see Hunter Sylvester.
[Hunter] They only got suspended two weeks.
Swanson wanted a month, but their ass-rapist coach intervened.
translation.ko: 처장님은 한 달을 원했는데 걔들 변태 코치가 방해했거든

translation.en: They can't come back to campus or anything.
But when they come back, they'll totally ass-rape me
for getting them suspended in the first place.
Getting them suspended? It's their fault.
I flicked him in the chops first.
Okay, well, at Clay Moss's party,
they pushed you into the speaker in front of everybody.
translation.ko: 애들 다 보는데 널 스피커로 밀쳤잖아

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think your average suburban Nazi shitbag
is gonna see it that way.
It's cool. Yeah, it's cool. Yeah.
Yeah, I kind of look like Jason Newsted from Metallica, the bass player.
translation.ko: 응, 메탈리카 베이스 제이슨 뉴스테드 같다

translation.en: Oh, right, the one who got fired.
No. No, not like the school mascot.
Less like the school mascot than anything on Earth.
translation.ko: 세상 모든 걸 닮아도 학교 마스코트는 싫어

translation.en: More like a baby's dick than the school mascot.
If a baby's dick grew its own baby dick, then my hair would be more like--
translation.ko: 아기 고추가 어엿하게 자라면 그때쯤엔 내 머리도…

translation.en: Sorry I'm so late. Glad you guys are still here.
translation.ko: 너무 늦어서 미안 아직 있어서 다행이네

translation.en: Well, how about you guys start playing and I'll work my way in.
translation.ko: 너희 먼저 시작하면 내가 알아서 들어갈게

translation.en: How far have you gone in the… the thing--
Yeah. I… I got through Metallica, Judas Priest.
I'm in the middle of Slayer right now and I'm having a little bit of trouble--
translation.ko: 슬레이어 곡을 연습 중인데 좀 어려워서…

translation.en: Let's try "For Whom the Bell Tolls." Okay? You got it, Kev?
translation.ko: '누구를 위하여 중은 울리나' 하자 알았지? 할 수 있지?

translation.en: One, two, three, four. One, two.
translation.ko: 하나, 둘, 셋, 넷, 하나, 둘

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, cool. All right, man.
That was cool. Le-- Um, let's try playing the song.
Let's try playing the song, and we can see how we vibe together as a band,
translation.ko: 곡을 연주하면서 호흡이 잘 맞는지 보자

translation.en: and then we'll work on all the stage-show elements later.
-[Kevin] Two, three, four. -[all playing "For Whom The Bell Tolls"]
Um, I'm, like, kind of getting confused, 'cause I just don't know what else to do.
[Clay] Dude, you can play, or you can be wasted,
but you can't play wasted. It's not working out.
translation.ko: 취한 채로 연주하면 어떡해? 연주가 안 되잖아

translation.en: We don't need a bass player to beat those stooges.
translation.ko: 베이스 없어도 저 쪼다들 이길 수 있어

translation.en: [scoffs] Weak. No, here, check this out.
It means that we wouldn't have to split our contest winnings three ways…
translation.ko: 대회에서 우승하려고 꼭 세 명을 맞출 필요는 없어

translation.en: [Kevin] It doesn't feel like a good time to tell Hunter
that I don't wanna be in a band that sounds like people being tortured.
translation.ko: 사람들 귀를 고문하는 밴드를 하기 싫다고 말할 순 없다

translation.en: But I think it's time for him to seriously consider the only good option we have.
translation.ko: 하지만 좋은 방법이 하나 있으니 헌터가 진지하게 고민했으면 한다

translation.en: It is time to speak truth to power.
We have, like, two weeks, and she can learn everything in two days.
translation.ko: 2주 정도 남았는데 얘는 이틀 만에 다 익힐 수 있어

translation.en: It's just you're not consistent with the image we're trying to project…
translation.ko: 우리가 추구하는 이미지에 넌 안 맞는 것 같아

translation.en: Is it because she's a girl?
Um, the-- What about The Runaways? That's Joan Jett.
translation.ko: - 더 런어웨이스도 있고 - 그게 조안 제트 밴드야

translation.en: -Okay. Well, there's Lita Ford. -That's The Runaways.
translation.ko: - 그래, 리타 포드도 있어 - 더 런어웨이스 멤버야

translation.en: [Kevin] And there's, um… There's, uh… What's her-- Um…
Kevin, we are a metal band.
We are not an indie metal band. We are not an alt-metal band.
We are not a sort of metal band. We are a metal band.
translation.ko: 메탈 스타일 밴드 말고 진짜 메탈 밴드라고

translation.en: And for us to have a cello player instead of a bass player
translation.ko: 그런데 베이스가 아니라 첼로 연주자가 있으면

translation.en: You've gotta take all that in context.
Gay? Our band is called Skullfucker.
translation.ko: 게이 같다고? 우리 밴드 이름은 스컬퍼커야

translation.en: You named it that to impress girls?
We're gonna die virgins in a band called Skullfucker.
translation.ko: 스컬퍼커라는 밴드를 하다간 우린 숫총각으로 죽을걸

translation.en: What I meant was, we're not--
Oh, come on. Like she didn't know.
Uh, hey, I… wanted to apologize
again for Hunter being so rude, and…
I was talking about that stuff he said about girl cello players
translation.ko: 아니, 그 얘기 말이야 여자 첼로 연주자가

translation.en: in a metal band being gay.
translation.ko: 메탈 밴드에 있으면 게이 같다는 거

translation.en: First of all, that's a totally messed up thing to say.
translation.ko: 그런 말 한 것도 진짜 나빴고

translation.en: No, he's not, and… you're not.
translation.ko: 안 맞아, 그리고… - 너도 안 그렇고 - 뭐가?

translation.en: Are we talking gayness, or heavy metal, or virginity?
translation.ko: 게이 얘기? 헤비메탈? 아니면 성 경험 얘기야?

translation.en: All of them, I think. Uh…
I guess there's sort of a spectrum.
Do you want to not be?
-You know where Temple Solel is? -On Cleavy? Yeah.
translation.ko: 템플 솔렐이 어딘지 알아? 클리비에 있는 거? 응

translation.en: Will you meet me in the car park in a half hour?
Oh, and can you bring thingies?
Well, your father should be back from the shop around 8:00.
-And then we-- -Mom, I need the car.
I thought it was something. You said it was something.
translation.ko: 중요한 일인 줄 알았는데 네가 그랬잖아

translation.en: Well, I was wrong. It was nothing.
I can imagine something being more important than a band practice.
But I definitely can't see how nothing could be more important, Kevin.
translation.ko: 어떻게 아무것도 아닌 일이 더 중요한지 모르겠다

translation.en: What I mean-- I don't need Abbott and Costello from you, okay?
translation.ko: - 내 말은… - 혼자 만담 하지 마, 알았어?

translation.en: I need a drummer. A real drummer.
mortification of the flesh and all that shit.
And if you're not gonna be,
if you'll be all "girls with cello, showing up whenever I feel like it,"
translation.ko: 첼로 하는 여자애 데려오거나 내킬 때만 연습 오면

translation.en: And we won't win the Battle of the Bands,
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드에서 우승도 못 하고

translation.en: and then you're gonna be a loser for the rest of your life.
Where did you learn how to play?
My friend just gave me these songs, and I practiced them.
I'm not, you know, a real drummer or anything.
Are they all like this? Just pretty much the same beat all the way through?
translation.ko: 다 이런 느낌이야? 끝까지 이 비트로 가?

translation.en: Please, Kevin. I promised my sister, and she's so psyched to have us play.
translation.ko: 부탁해, 누나한테 약속해서 우리 공연을 엄청 기대 중이거든

translation.en: But Ray's not getting out of rehab for another month,
translation.ko: 근데 레이는 다음 달까지 재활원에서 못 나와

translation.en: and we're tired of playing with a wasted drummer.
translation.ko: 우리도 주정뱅이 드러머랑 연주하는 거 지겹고

translation.en: but it's like I said, I'm in this band with Hunter,
translation.ko: 나도 하고 싶은데 난 헌터랑 같이 밴드 해

translation.en: and Battle of the Bands is really important to him.
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드가 걔한테는 엄청 중요하거든

translation.en: -Lots of guys are in two bands. -Eric Clapton was in, like, 60 bands.
translation.ko: - 밴드 두 팀 하는 사람 많아 - 에릭 클랩턴은 60팀은 했을걸

translation.en: And I heard you play, man.
You could learn our songs in ten minutes.
Don't even worry about the Battle of the Bands for now,
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드는 일단 생각하지 마

translation.en: -Let me think about it. -[Clay] I feel you.

translation.ko: 다섯 번 중에 세 번 이겼지?

translation.en: I'm pretty sure you're better at staring than me.
translation.ko: 눈싸움은 네가 더 잘하는 것 같네

translation.en: On the field, when I first saw you…
translation.ko: 운동장에서 널 처음 봤을 때 있잖아

translation.en: throw stuff and yell at people?
Feels good to not want to throw stuff and yell at people.
translation.ko: 뭘 던지거나 소리 지르고 싶지 않을 때가 좋지

translation.en: Look, you've got to understand something, Kevin. We don't fit in.
translation.ko: 네가 알아야 할 게 있어 우린 사람들이랑 안 맞아

translation.en: You can try as hard as you want. You can get yourself a girlfriend,
or whatever, but you still won't fit in.
She doesn't fit in either. Why can't we all not fit in together?
translation.ko: 에밀리도 마찬가지야 다 같이 못 어울리면 안 돼?

translation.en: We're not talking about that now. I don't even wanna go there.
translation.ko: 그런 말이 아니야 그 얘긴 할 생각 없어

translation.en: We're talking about you being a traitor-- Maybe I wanna talk about it.
translation.ko: - 난 네가 배신자란 거야 - 난 얘기하고 싶어

translation.en: I'm the founding member of Skullfucker, and I say no Yokos.
translation.ko: 스컬퍼커 창단 멤버로서 오노 요코는 사양이야

translation.en: We are both founding members of Skullfucker.
I write songs, buy equipment, designed our Facebook page--
translation.ko: 곡도 쓰고 장비도 사고 페이스북 페이지도 만들었잖아

translation.en: I'm the founding member of Skullfucker, and I say no Yokos!
translation.ko: 스컬퍼커 창단 멤버로서 오노 요코는 사양이라고!

translation.en: No, you-- No. You can't just declare end of conversation. You don't have that authority.
translation.ko: 그걸 왜 네가 정해? 넌 그럴 권한 없어

translation.en: And that is how you knit a sweater.
Did you hear how she enunciated and projected?
translation.ko: 앤드리아가 발음과 전달을 어떻게 하는지 들었니?

translation.en: Get her all the way in the back, right?
Not unbecoming men that strove with gods."
You might know it from your English class.
Metal is about what "Ulysses" was about.
The people that crossed the Bering Strait 12,000 years ago?
translation.ko: 12,000년 전에 베링 해협을 건넌 사람들 있지?

translation.en: The people on the Mayflower… [plays screeching note]
…would've been metal if it weren't for all the Jesus crap.
translation.ko: 예수 타령만 안 했으면 메탈이었을 거야

translation.en: And Ulysses, what did he do?

translation.ko: 단테의 시를 읽어봐 그럼 알게 될 거야

translation.en: Ulysses got together the baddest ass crew he could find,
and then he sailed off beyond the Pillars of Hercules,
and pulled right down to hell.
[playing and speaking] What is more metal than that?
So… achieving your dreams with fellow badasses,
going to hell if you have to…
But it wasn't so easy for Ulysses.
He wasted decades of his life on that shit.
translation.ko: 그딴 헛소리 때문에 율리시스는 수십 년을 낭비했지

translation.en: But one day, Ulysses decided he was finished with his woman.
translation.ko: 그런데 어느 날, 율리시스는 그 여자와 끝내기로 했어

translation.en: Sooner or later, the metal inside him was bound to rise up…
translation.ko: 언젠가 율리시스 내면의 메탈 정신이 깨어나

translation.en: [playing shrill solo] …and crush whatever stood in its path!
translation.ko: 앞길을 막는 걸 다 부숴버릴 테니까!

translation.en: -[screams] Fucker! Fucking cunt! -[Hunter] You're fucking crazy!
translation.ko: - 야, 이 망할 새끼야! - 진짜 돌았네

translation.en: I'll fucking-- I will fucking kill you!
-Don't you ever come near me again! -[Hunter] Ow!
That was inappropriate, bordering on inexcusable.
translation.ko: 부적절한 행동이었어 용서가 안 될 정도로

translation.en: I completely agree. I'm talking about you.
translation.ko: - 누가 아니래요? - 네 얘길 하는 거야

translation.en: Is that what you've learned from your interactions
translation.ko: 스킵 호프먼처럼 포악하고 못된 애를 상대하면서

translation.en: with the vicious morons like Skip Hoffman?
How to torment people weaker than you?
Look, I've got some personal issues with her--
I could give a shit about your personal issues with that poor girl.
translation.ko: 그 불쌍한 애랑 무슨 문제가 있는지 관심 없다

translation.en: You're going to write down exactly what you did.
If Miss Johnson corroborates your account,
translation.ko: 존슨 선생님이 네 설명을 옹호해 주면

translation.en: I'll include it in the disciplinary notice I'll send to your father.
translation.ko: 징계 통보서에 추가해서 너희 아버지께 보낼 거야

translation.en: If she doesn't, I will suspend you.
You are afraid of everybody, and instead of showing it like I do,
translation.ko: 넌 모든 사람을 두려워해 근데 나처럼 티를 안 내고

translation.en: you treat everybody like shit and you make them hate you.
translation.ko: 모두한테 개 같이 굴어서 다들 널 싫어하게 만들어

translation.en: Great. They leave you alone, they leave me alone.
Both of us are alone. Mission accomplished.
You need me a lot more than I need you.
translation.ko: 나보다는 네가 더 날 필요로 하잖아

translation.en: Without me, all of your dumb fantasies disappear.
translation.ko: 나 없이는 그 한심한 환상도 다 물거품이 될 테니까

translation.en: But without you, I might actually live a real life.
translation.ko: 하지만 난 너 없으면 제대로 살 수 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: Fine. Fine. Go enjoy your new fucking wacko girlfriend
translation.ko: 그래, 맛탱이 간 새 여자 친구랑 잘해봐라

translation.en: and your new--- and your new shitty band and--
translation.ko: 새로 들어간 그 개 구린 밴드랑

translation.en: It's Hunter's fault. He's a massive dick.
But I never would've lost it like that
translation.ko: 내가 약을 안 끊었으면 폭발하지 않았을 거야

translation.en: -if I hadn't stopped taking my meds. -It was not your fault! Wh--
translation.ko: 내가 약을 안 끊었으면 폭발하지 않았을 거야 네 잘못 아니라니까!

translation.en: You didn't do anything wrong. There's nothing wrong with you.
translation.ko: 넌 잘못한 거 없어 잘못된 것도 없고

translation.en: The concentration of serotonin in my synapses is too low.
translation.ko: 난 시냅스의 세로토닌 농도가 너무 낮아

translation.en: Okay, but there's something more wrong with everyone else.
translation.ko: 그래, 근데 다른 사람들이 더 잘못됐어

translation.en: You have a right to be mad, especially at Hunter.
[sniffles] Everybody else didn't make me like this.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들 때문에 이렇게 된 게 아니야

translation.en: Hunter didn't make me like this.
They try as hard as they can.
There may be something… wrong with you, but…
It's because people treat you like you're invisible.
translation.ko: 사람들이 널 투명 인간 취급 하니까

translation.en: Like you're not even there. Like you're nothing.
translation.ko: 그 자리에 없는 사람처럼 넌 아무것도 아니란 듯이

translation.en: But you're more than that. You're better than that.

translation.ko: 아무것도 아니지 않아 넌 소중한 애야

translation.en: We're done taking shit, you and me.
translation.ko: 우리 이제 누가 괴롭히면 참지 말자

translation.en: Take off the costume, Krusty the Clown.
translation.ko: 그 코스튬 벗어, 이 광대 자식아

translation.en: We gotta talk about this, uh, "What I did at school today" essay right here.
translation.ko: '학교에서 저지른 짓' 반성문 얘기 좀 하자

translation.en: Sorry, you're just a little late with the whole parenting thing.
translation.ko: 미안한데 이제 와서 부모 노릇 하려 들지 마요

translation.en: No, you ain't. Get the hell out of here.
[Clay] That was great, brother. Really great.
You killed that shit. We never sounded anything like that before.
translation.ko: 죽여줬다니까 우리가 그렇게 잘한 적 처음이야

translation.en: I want you to know, man, if…
If you wanna play with us at the Battle of the Bands,
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드에 우리랑 나가고 싶으면

translation.en: we would love to have you.
I mean, if you just wanna hang, it's… It's all good.
Yeah, I might take you up on both of those.
Wanna come hang with the other dudes? Yeah. Yes.
Let me just finish up here.
You're lucky they didn't press charges.
Weapons confiscated from a minor at the time of an arrest
shall be considered forfeit to the township.
This is the last straw. No, wait.
-The Battle of the Bands is on Friday-- -Not for you it ain't!
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드가 금요일이에요 넌 못 나가!

translation.en: I don't have a bathing suit.
Every time I see you, you are wasted.
Hey, let me try your glasses.
I saw Timothée Chalamet wearing glasses like this on Insta once.
translation.ko: 인스타에서 티모시 샬라메가 이런 안경 쓴 거 봤어

translation.en: I like Call Me by Your Name.
translation.ko: 나 '콜 미 바이 유어 네임' 좋아해

translation.en: My cousin in Santa Barbara totally fucked him.
translation.ko: 샌타바버라에 사는 내 사촌이 그 배우랑 잤잖아

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. Well, I don't even know your name.
Yo, dude. What, are you waiting for a tutorial?
Come on, man. What about Emily? They've got a real relationship.
translation.ko: 이건 아니지, 에밀리는 어쩌고? 쟤 에밀리랑 진지하게 만나잖아

translation.en: One built on trust and emotional honesty.
translation.ko: 신뢰와 정서적 솔직함을 바탕으로 쌓은 관계라고

translation.en: And this? I mean, come on, dude. What's really going on here?
translation.ko: 근데 뭐야? 이러면 안 되지 이게 지금 무슨 상황이야?

translation.en: Hold on, Tom. Kendall's a person too.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 톰 켄들도 사람이야, 케빈이 좋다잖아

translation.en: She likes Kevin. She's making her desires known.
translation.ko: 켄들도 사람이야, 케빈이 좋다잖아 자기 마음을 표현하고 있어 그게 잘못은 아니지

translation.en: There's absolutely nothing wrong with that.
translation.ko: 자기 마음을 표현하고 있어 그게 잘못은 아니지

translation.en: Yeah, maybe, but Emily's really loyal. This would ruin her.
translation.ko: 그래도 에밀리는 케빈만 보잖아 이걸 알면 큰 상처를 받을 거야

translation.en: Back in the day, we all got up to stuff.
[Morello] He's only a drummer. He should have what he wants.
translation.ko: 쟤는 겨우 드러머야 원하는 걸 가져야지

translation.en: If he's in that hot tub, he'll have what he gets.
translation.ko: 저 안에 있으면 원하는 걸 얻을 거야

translation.en: [Kevin] A year ago, I didn't know who these guys were.
But now, after a bottle of champagne, they're all making some really good points.
translation.ko: 근데 샴페인 한 병을 마셨더니 저 사람들 말이 일리가 있다

translation.en: You found someone who loves you.
Then, don't be an asshole, Kevin.
[Kevin] Thank you, Rob Halford of Judas Priest.
You don't turn your back on the people who love you.
translation.ko: 날 사랑하는 사람을 배신하면 안 된다

translation.en: You don't have to. I want to.
I've been looking for this for, like, forever. [chuckles]
You wouldn't even know about Lamb of God if it wasn't for me?
translation.ko: 넌 나 아니었으면 램 오브 갓도 몰랐을 거면서!

translation.en: ♪ And I don't have one who cares ♪
Listen, I've got to get out of here immediately. I've got this important--
translation.ko: 저 당장 나가야 해요 진짜 중요한 일이…

translation.en: We are doing a preliminary eval on you, right?
translation.ko: 너에 대한 예비 평가를 할 거야

translation.en: Dude. Dude, you guys were gods.
-I-- I go to Glenwood Lake High, man. -I see that.
Place like this saved me from a slow fucking suicide,
translation.ko: 죽으려고 환장한 듯 살았는데 이런 곳이 날 구했지

translation.en: so I went back to school, got my Psy D.
translation.ko: 그래서 학교로 돌아가 심리학 학위를 땄어

translation.en: Give something back, that kind of shit.
translation.ko: 받은 만큼 돌려주자 뭐 그런 의미로

translation.en: They wouldn't practice, wouldn't learn the songs.
translation.ko: 연습도 안 하고 곡도 안 익히고

translation.en: -So that's why you broke up? -That was part of it.
But mostly it was because those guys were fuck-holes.
They wouldn't go an inch out of their own way for anybody but themselves.
translation.ko: 남 생각은 전혀 안 하고 자기들밖에 몰랐거든

translation.en: Look, if you're gonna record with people, you're gonna tour with people,
translation.ko: 남들이랑 음반 작업을 하든 투어를 다닐 거면

translation.en: you're gonna spend all day, every day, with them for years,
translation.ko: 다 같이 오랫동안 매일 온종일 함께해야 해

translation.en: you sure as shit better like hanging out with them.
Otherwise, your life is gonna suck.
Then you're gonna start drinking to forget how bad your life sucks,
translation.ko: 그 고달픔을 잊으려고 술 마시기 시작하고

translation.en: I get this kind of shit all the time. Okay, come on.
[Dr. Nix] He's a mess. He and I have a lot of work to do.
Which is why I can't babysit your ass just because you like brutal fucking music.
translation.ko: 네가 난폭한 음악 좋아한다고 널 어르고 달랠 여력이 없어

translation.en: The board will follow my recommendations. They always do.
translation.ko: 이사회는 늘 그렇듯 내 권고를 따를 거고

translation.en: -I scare the shit out of them. -Thank you, man. Thank you.
translation.ko: 나한테 엄청 쫄거든 - 진짜 고맙습니다 - 고맙긴

translation.en: No problem. We will have you out of here by Monday.
translation.ko: - 진짜 고맙습니다 - 고맙긴 월요일에 나가게 해줄게

translation.en: They review recommendations over the weekend.
Okay. Um, is there any way we could get that review done tonight?
translation.ko: 그럼 오늘 밤까지 끝낼 방법은 없을까요?

translation.en: They're already driving home in their Jaguars listening to Sting. Why?
translation.ko: 다들 벌써 재규어 타고 스팅 노래 들으면서 퇴근 중이야, 근데 왜?

translation.en: The Battle of the Bands is tomorrow, and my band is totally poised to win.
translation.ko: 내일 배틀 오브 밴드를 하는데 우리 밴드가 꼭 우승할 거거든요

translation.en: Fucking Battle of the motherfucking Bands.
translation.ko: 그 망할 놈의 배틀 오브 밴드

translation.en: Anyway, give you another year to practice.
Yeah, are we going to practice before?
No? Okay. No. We don't need to. It's fine.
translation.ko: 안 한다고? 알았어 안 그래도 돼, 괜찮아

translation.en: Yeah, I'll see you at 7:00 at the cafeteria.
[automated message] It's Hunter. I'm not here. Deal.
Who the fuck calls on a landline?
No, Hunter isn't here right now.
I feel like this is his way of begging me to come back to the band.
translation.ko: 헌터가 밴드로 돌아오라고 나한테 비는 것만 같다

translation.en: There's definitely something wrong with him. He's shitty to everyone.
translation.ko: 걔는 확실히 문제가 있어 모두한테 함부로 하잖아

translation.en: Even you. You're supposed to be his best friend.
You said it yourself, he's a massive dick.
I would have never understood what a massive dick he is if it wasn't for you.
translation.ko: 너 아니었으면 헌터가 왕재수인지 몰랐을 거야

translation.en: And I wouldn't have met you if it wasn't for metal,
translation.ko: 메탈이 아니었으면 너도 못 만났을 거고

translation.en: and I wouldn't have thought about metal for five seconds if it wasn't for Hunter.
translation.ko: 헌터가 아니었으면 메탈 생각은 5초도 안 했겠지

translation.en: I gotta get him out of there.
Wait, so first you tell me that I should hate him,
and now you want me to help him?
Uh, you'd sort of be helping me help him.
translation.ko: 헌터를 돕는 게 날 도와주는 거야

translation.en: [groans, yells] No, I can't! Not after what he did.
translation.ko: 못 하겠어! 걔한테 그런 짓을 당했는데

translation.en: You don't have to. It's okay. I mean it.
Yeah. Yeah, I… I hope so.
My best friend, he's-- he's got problems. He's a, uh…
-Turpentine, butane, propane? -Yep, yep, yep, all those.
translation.ko: - 테레빈유? 부탄? 프로판? - 네, 전부 다요

translation.en: He mixes them, and his parents don't know what to do,
so I wanted to get them a brochure.
You're a good friend. They're right back there.
Wait right here. I'll get some more.
You four have outdone yourselves yet again.
It definitely looks like a party in here.
[man and woman on TV] Thank you.
[TV host] Now, before you tell us which dessert you're taking,
translation.ko: 어떤 디저트를 골랐는지 말씀해 주시기 전에

translation.en: All right, you two, which dessert are you choosing?
-[suspenseful music playing on TV] -We are choosing…
-[woman sighs] -[man] Come on. [woman] Are you serious?
Look, man, I gotta tell you, I'm just--
-I, uh… -Tell me later. Please. Come on.
You know Ray. He's the drummer from Mollycoddle.
You do know we have to bring you back after Battle of the Bands?
translation.ko: 배틀 오브 밴드 끝나면 다시 들어와야 하는 거 알지?

translation.en: Can't deal on the outside. I don't have the coping mechanisms.
translation.ko: 난 어차피 밖에 못 있어 견디지를 못하거든

translation.en: Okay, wait. How are we getting out?
You'll never get clean articulation at high speeds with a pick this thin.
translation.ko: 피크가 이렇게 얇으면 빠른 리듬이 깔끔하게 안 돼

translation.en: It's a real piece of shit.
You deserve a better best friend.
Yeah, probably, but you're the one I got.
You nearly cracked my fucking skull, dude.
And you put a really large dent in my guitar.
Your behavior has been violent and unpredictable.
So will you please, please, please,
and come crack some fucking skulls with us at the Battle of the Bands?
translation.ko: 우리랑 배틀 오브 밴드에서 사람들 머리통 좀 울려볼래?

translation.en: Mollycoddle, you guys are up next.
You guys have been great, and I'd love to play with you again, but…
translation.ko: 너희가 정말 잘해줬고 또 같이 연주하고 싶지만…

translation.en: [Kevin] I can only be in one band.
I've been meaning to apologize for what happened at my party.
translation.ko: 내 파티 때 있었던 일 사과하고 싶었어

translation.en: Yup, and I'm sorry about the things I said about your band.
translation.ko: 응, 너희 밴드한테 한 말도 미안해

translation.en: So may the best band win.
So you guys like a duo?
You're lucky to have this guy, man.
translation.ko: 너 얘 있어서 복 받은 줄 알아

translation.en: -I got a bottle of Jack in the new truck. -Let's go!
[Clay] Thank you, Glenwood Lake. GLHS is lit!
-I love you! -[Hunter] Nix was right about this pick.
I can do this. We're gonna crush this shit.
How will it sound with nothing on the bottom, no chords, no riff?
No, it-- it'll be like, uh…
Nope. That is not appropriate. It's got to go.
-[song stops] -[Kevin] No, it can't go. It is painted on the heads.
Well, I can't let you bring those in there, so…
-Eli, I need a favor. -Of course, Emily. What do you need?
translation.ko: - 일라이, 부탁이 있어요 - 그래, 뭘 도와줄까?

translation.en: I need to get into the art room.
Ladies and gentlemen, a round of applause for Skullflower.
This is a little song… about…

translation.ko: 어머니는 날 피 흘리게 내버려 둬

translation.en: ♪ Father, Father Deaf to children's call… ♪
Hey, isn't that Hunter Sylvester and Kevin Schlieb?
translation.ko: 저거 헌터 실베스터랑 케빈 슐라이브 아니야?

translation.en: And what's-her-name, the-- the shitty clarinetist.
translation.ko: 쟤 이름은 뭐더라? 클라리넷 삑삑대는 애

translation.en: Could've been in a band with those guys.
♪ I built it for you all ♪
♪ Your prom king crown's The first thing struck ♪
♪ Turned into a bucket of fuck ♪
♪ I built it for every one of you ♪
♪ I built it for you all ♪
♪ I built it for you all ♪
♪ I built it for you ♪ [falsetto] ♪ All ♪
Hunter, don't look at your leg, okay?
Gotta wiggle them. Come on, little fuckers.
[Emily groans] This fucking bow is fucked.
-[Emily grunts] -[Hunter] Ow, dude. -Dude. -[Emily] I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Sorry.
Silver medalists. We came in second.
Oh, hey, uh, looks like you're going viral.
Well… at least I didn't get arrested.
They're nice guys. The people have spoken. This is what they want.
translation.ko: 좋은 애들이잖아 이게 모두가 원하는 결과야

translation.en: [Kevin] Who are people gonna remember? Us.
That is us right there, headlining.
-We were good. -[Kevin] No, we were fucking great.
Yes, she did. That was some Yo-Yo Ma shit.
-And your solo… -Holy fuck, that was unreal.
Oh, my man slapped them in their faces with his double bass dick.
translation.ko: 크고 묵직한 내 남친답게 실력으로 사람들 혼을 빼놨어

translation.en: Let them have their fads. Fads come and go.
translation.ko: 걔들은 지금을 즐기라고 해 인기는 있다가도 없으니까

translation.en: Now it starts for us. Now people know our name.
translation.ko: 우린 이제 시작이지 우리 이름을 알렸잖아
